docs.lead_paragraph: SEVERAL weeks ago, Nathan Brandt Jr. sat down at the dinner table and said to his son: "Tony, tonight we're going to have a little discussion about drugs."

headline.main: For Many Parents, Drug Education Is Becoming a Family Affair

docs.abstract: Article on family discussion as way of educating youngsters on dangers of using drugs; illus
docs.snippet: SEVERAL weeks ago, Nathan Brandt Jr. sat down at the dinner table and said to his son: "Tony, tonight we're going to have a little discussion about drugs."

docs.lead_paragraph: WASHINGTON The era of chemical birth control is about to enter its second decade with the prospect that it will be as far different from the first as that span was from all the ages that went before.
